mapper.select: select last_number-1 from user_sequences where sequence_name = 'RENT_SEQUENCE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENT(rental_code, rent_start_date, rent_end_date, member_id, total_rent_price) VALUES( rent_sequence.nextval, #{rent_start_date}, #{rent_end_date}, #{member_id}, #{total_rent_price} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.prod_name, M.brand, SPS.opt_id1, SPS.opt_id2, SPS.opt_id3, SPS.opt_id4, SPS.opt_id5, RD.rent_product_price, PI.img_url FROM RENT R JOIN RENT_DETAIL RD ON R.rental_code = RD.rental_code JOIN RENT_PROD_STOCK SPS ON RD.stock_id = SPS.stock_id JOIN PROD P ON SPS.prod_id = P.prod_id JOIN MEMBER M ON P.member_id = M.member_id JOIN PROD_IMAGE PI ON P.prod_id = PI.prod_id where r.rental_code = #{aa}
